Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes the office of special investigation for work-related fatalities
Summary: Establishes the office of special investigation for work-related fatalities; provides direction for coroners and medical examiners when dealing with such fatalities.
LawCode: Add ยง70-d, Exec L; amd ยง671, County L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the county law, in relation to establishing the office of special investigation for work-related fatalities
